Measure Map view Distance Area Elevation Map Satellite Terrain Metric units About This app was created by Thomas Hoffmann (www.j4velin.de) and uses the \'Google Maps API v2\'.\n\nMaps Measure is open source! Get the code from GitHub.\n\n App version: %s More apps delete Delete all %d points?
